questions.question: 1. The number of unknowns to be determined in the stiffness method is known as_____

answers.c: Difference of Static indeterminacy and kinematic indeterminacy

explanations.b: The number of unknowns to be determined in the stiffness method is called kinematic indeterminacy

questions.question: 2. The DKI of plane truss is ________

explanations.d: The DKI of plane truss is 2J – r

questions.question: 3. An internal hinge in a plane frame increase DKI by  (N = No. of member meeting at the joint).

explanations.a: An internal hinge in a plane frame increase DKI by N where N is Number of members meeting at the joint

questions.question: 4. The DKI of a plane frame with extensible member is_____

explanations.a: The DKI of a plane frame with extensible member is 3j – r

questions.question: 5. The DKI of a continuous beam is equal to_____

explanations.b: The DKI of a continuous beam is equal to number of supports + 1
